author: costin
msg: I'm after config problems, this is a small fix in server.xml reading.
We need to collect all modules declarations from modules.xml, so
context.xml doesn't have to read them again. However while reading
server.xml we don't need to add them again.
This is important as <module> declaration could happen inside server.xml
( or another file that defines/configures modules ). There's no need
to edit both modules.xml and server.xml.

author: costin
msg: Changed a bit the message ( displayed if an app is declared explicitely
with a <context> config, and auto-webapp doesn't need to add it automatically )
We could just remove the message, but it gives an important information - that
a certain context may have special config, it's not a regular auto-added
app.

author: costin
msg: Fix the paths for all contexts that are loaded via explicit config
when tomcat becomes stable ( i.e. all core modules were loaded, and
tomcat is ready to start )

author: costin
msg: Reset the interceptors, it may have changed.
Display a message when tomcat is in stable state.

msg: Correct getRemoteAddr() bug in native http 1.0 connector
